2025 ELECTION INFORMATION
-------------------------

[Election Calendar 2025](https://www.beachcitytx.us/Election%20Dates%20Calendar%202025.docx?t=202508051150450)  
CANDIDATE APPLICATION  
**Applications are available for pick up during normal business hours and Notaries are available on site to notarize.**   
  
Filing a place on the ballot is set by state statute and will run from July 19, 2025 - August 18, 2025. The following form is available for filing:  
  
What are the qualifications for council members?  
A candidate for city council must meet all eligibility requirements that the mayor and each of the five council members shall be a citizen of the United States of America and a qualified voter of the city and shall have resided continuously in the state for 12 months and in the territory from which the office is elected for six months immediately preceding the date of the regular filing deadline for a candidate's application for place on the ballot. A member of council who lacks any qualifications for the office prescribed by the law; or convicted of a felony while in office, shall immediately forfeit the office.  
In addition to the residency requirements described above, state law provides that a candidate for city council must:   
- Be a United States Citizen.  
- Be a registered voter of the city at the time of filing for office.  
- Be 18 years of age or older on or before the first day of the term in which they are elected.  
- Have not been determined by a final judgement of a court exercising probate jurisdiction to be:  
     - Totally mentally incapacitated; or  
     - Partially mentally incapacitated without the right to vote.  
     - Have not been finally convicted of a felony from which the person has not been pardoned or otherwise released from the resulting disabilities.  
     - Have resided continuously in the state for 12 months and in the territory from which the office is elected for six months immediately preceding.  
     - Satisfy any other eligibility requirements prescribed by law of the office.





![Doc app](https://www.beachcitytx.us/revize/plugins/document_center/_images_/app.png)

Document Center
---------------

The Document Center provides easy access to public documents. Click on one of the categories below to see related documents or use the search function.

Search for file name:
---------------------




Categories always sorted by seq (sub-categories sorted within each category)
  
Documents sorted by \_RECORDID in Ascending Order within category

RESET
